name: Lemongrass Fields Spray Mist 8oz
description:
This lemongrass scented spray mist  has some great uses. You can use it as a body spray,  as a natural air freshener, or even spray it on pillows, linens and more. The essence of lemongrass is so energizing and cheery.

Spray away to lighten your mood and lift your spirits!

SunnyGirl Organics offers pure and simple organic bath and body care products. There's no need to brag, the proof is in the ingredients!

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Grain Alcohol, Organic Lemongrass Essential Oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus) for fragrance.

name: Fragrance Free Hand & Body Lotion 8oz
description:
This fragrance free hand & body lotion is made with simple, pure and gentle organic ingredients. It is perfect for those with super sensitive skin and/or for those who prefer lotion without a scent. The main ingredients are a combination of pure shea butter and cocoa butter, which are so soothing and moisturizing for sensitive skin.

Feed your skin what it needs - NATURE!

SunnyGirl Organics offers pure and simple organic bath and body care products. There's no need to brag, the proof is in the ingredients!

Ingredients:

Distilled water, Helianthus Annuus (Organic Sunflower Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Organic Shea Butter), Cannabis Sativa (Organic Hemp Seed Oil), Olea Europaea (Organic Olive Oil), Eco Mulse (Emulsifier),   Theobroma Cacao (Organic Cocoa Butter), Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary Leaf Extract)

name: Pink Grapefruit Liquid Hand Soap 8oz
description:
This hand soap is made with organic ingredients, making it a wonderful alternative to harsh chemicals that dry out your hands. The scent of pink grapefruit is so uplifting and cheery.

I bet you'll smile every time you use it...wink wink!

SunnyGirl Organics offers pure and simple organic bath and body care products. There's no need to brag, the proof is in the ingredients!

Ingredients:

Saponified Oils of Coconut, Olive, and Jojoba (Organic), Glycerin/Vegetable Gum Extract, Aloe Vera (Organic) Rosemary Extract, Citrus Racemosa (Natural Pink Grapfruit Essential Oil), Cannabis Sativa (Organic Hemp Seed Oil).

description:

name: Flea & Tick Prevention Wash 16OZ
description:
Did you know that your dog's liver and kidneys are adversely affected by the use of commercial flea & tick products? Our products contain only organic essential oils combined with other organic ingredients for the safest and most natural way to care for your pet. The scent of citronella (lemongrass) and rosemary combined are used to repel harmful insects on animals and humans.

If your dog could talk they would say, "Can you please buy me this amazing organic flea & tick prevention wash?"

SunnyDog Organics offers pure and simple organic bath and body care products. There's no need to brag, the proof is in the ingredients!

Ingredients:

Saponified oils of Coconut, Olive, and Jojoba (Organic), Glycerin/Vegetable Gum Exract, Rosemary Extract, Cymbopogan Citratus (Organic Lemongrass Essential Oil), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Organic Rosemary Essential Oil), Cannabis Sativa (Organic Hemp Seed Oil)

name: Lavender Hand & Body Lotion 8oz
description:
Lavender Essential Oil is one of the most commonly used oils for aromatherapy. Aside from its value for beauty and fragrance, Lavender is also popular for its variety of uses. The essence of this flower is calming and soothing. The moisturizing properties of this lotion include: shea butter, sunflower oil, hemp seed oil and olive oil. 

Go ahead and pamper yourself with this moisturizing, heavenly scented organic lotion!

SunnyGirl Organics offers pure and simple organic bath and body care products. There's no need to brag, the proof is in the ingredients!

Ingredients:

name: Facial Toner 4oz
description:
Pink Grapefruit Essential Oil has many benefits when used in skin care. It contains high amounts of vitamin C, which is a skin loving antioxidant. It also makes a very effective skin toner and greatly benefits oily or congested skin. 

The scent is so energizing and positive, so be sure and make it part of your morning skin care routine. Start your day off with glowing skin and a  big smile!



Ingredients

Alcohol Free Witch Hazel, Vegetable Glycerin, Citrus Racemosa (Natural Pink Grapefruit Essential Oil), Citrus Limon (Organic Lemon Essential Oil)

description:
The scent of Orange Essential Oil is so refreshing and when combined with a hint of vanilla, it immediately becomes mouth watering delicious! There are many benefits of orange essential oil to the skin due to the presence of vitamin C, a skin loving antioxidant. We then add our exclusive selection of nourishing oils to give it a perfect balance of moisture.

You will definitely get some positive attention with this scent!! And possibly a nibble or two...

description:

It is also ideal for oily skin, which makes it a wonderful, natural skin toner. We combine this beneficial oil with shea butter, sunflower oil, hemp seed oil, and olive oil to create an ultra moisturizing drink for your skin.

Coconut Oil allows for easy absorption through the skin, giving it a soft, smooth texture.  It makes an ideal aid for the relief of dry, parched skin.
